messages.message: Spiky ice is bad for your health
Snow trolls don't like anyone, it's not personal
Dress in whatever you want or at least whatever you have
Jumping down from snowy cliffs is fine and fun
Keep moving to stay warm and to find more adventures
Slime village ahead, friends only!
A giant snowball.  Too big to move, but cold enough to melt.
Gnome village ahead, bring money!
Oh my! It has been a long time since a star princess has visited us.
The last one who visited must have come before the mountain had frozen over.
You must be freezing!  Take my extra hat!
Beautiful weather today.  May the stars ever shine upon you!
I love this icy mountain.  I will be so sad when I have to move back to the peak.  I can barely sleep up there because of that shiny stone floating about.
Welcome to our cave, we slimes are proud to host a real princess!
I hope Chef makes more soup soon, we guards have to keep warm.
The old mines are locked shut for your safety.  No way to get in there.
The old mines are open I guess, enjoy the warm breeze.
The wind from the old mines is warm and cozy.  No one can know that I sneak in through the rubble.
This is Mirror Mountain.
People used to travel from all over to make wishes at the mountain top.
Then the mountain froze and the wishes stopped coming true.
If I were a star princess, I would make the gnomes run away!
Princess star magic is amazing!  It can turn crystals into potions and make monsters run away!
Red Crystals are spicy and Blue Crystals minty!
Princess magic can be used to find out what people really want, but it only works on kind folk and monsters.
The kings eyes are so beautiful.
I love being a blue slimey!  We are tiny, quick, and cute!
Green slimes are so big, stinky, and scary!
The gnomes stole our soup!  If you want some, you'll have to go take it back from them.
You keep that soup and I'll make some fresh for us slimes.
I love making soup, maybe I'll just give some to the gnomes.
Our soup allows princesses to magically summon monster friends!
This soup makes princesses sleepy.  So only summon your friends in a safe place.
Within in our vault we have hidden away princess treasures.
Please fetch the treasures and make the wishes come true.
If you find any monster soup, come visit me.  Until then please use the treasures to make wishes come true.
You have shown us slimes kindness and given us hope.
You may summon us whenever you need and we will answer!
You can always call on the blue slimes and we will answer!
I wish for my people to be safe from the giant berserker gnome king.
With the berserker king gone, we slimes are safe!
We slimes can explore and eat soup soup peacefully.
